mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_ID AS roomId, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, ADMIN_NO AS adminNo, UNREAD_COUNT AS unreadCount, CREATED_AT AS createdAt, CLOSED_AT AS closedAt, LAST_MSG_AT AS lastMessageAt FROM CHAT_ROOM ORDER BY NVL(LAST_MSG_AT, CREATED_AT) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE (MSG_ID, ROOM_ID, SENDER_TYPE, SENDER_ID, MESSAGE, SENT_AT) VALUES (SEQ_CHAT_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL, #{roomId}, #{senderType}, #{senderId}, #{message}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_ID as roomId, SENDER_TYPE as senderType, SENDER_ID as senderId, MESSAGE as message, SENT_AT as sentAt FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE ROOM_ID = #{roomId} ORDER BY SENT_AT
